trends: There have been no other sightings in Cuba
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am attaching a photo taken in the early 1980s near Cuba NM. The man in the photo is my friend Tony and his horse. He does not remember who took the picture. He does recall seeing a flash of light at the moment the photo was taken. He loaned me the Polaroid and I scanned it in as a pdf and a gif file. It is the strangest picture I have ever seen.
